As we know, NEAT gets a abnormity topology structure of a ANN for a 
specia=
l function not similar with the traditional BP networks. Since 
the traditi=
onal BP networks are constructed with clear layers. Now I'm 
puzzled that i=
t seems more complex for a abnormity topology structure 
network to workout=
 the output of a input although it has less nodes and 
connections.It takes=
 more memory and longer time. Although the networks 
with layers have more =
"complex" topology, them have regular algorithm 
and can workout a output m=
ore quickly with less memory. What benefit do 
the abnormity topology struc=
ture networks bring to us? Only becaues 
they are "simpler" only when we se=
e them with our eyes?
